title: Will Jordan Peterson and Sam Harris get hopelessly tangled on "what is religion"?
description:
Jordan Peterson and Sam Harris are going to have 4 conversations in the next month. There is a good chance they'll get bogged down on some basic terminology and meaning. This is a sort video noting just one area of significant difference, the definition of "religion". 

Sam Harris gave a good interview on The Rubin Report which is worth watching in anticipation of these events. https://youtu.be/gFio_8aUS4I 

Later this week I'll release a much longer video on this topic. 

For the audio podcast mirror on Podbean http://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/

To listen to this on ITunes https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/paul-vanderklays-podcast/id1394314333 

If you need the RSS feed for your podcast player https://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/feed/ 

To support this channel/podcast on Patreon https://www.patreon.com/paulvanderklay
